full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LEGS SBYAR SMRA BA'I SGRON ME BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SMRA BA DPAL LDAN DBANG PO'I SDE ZHES BYA BAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)` , ,LEGS SBYAR SMRA BA'I SGRON ME 'CHAD PA LA GSUM, ,KLAD KYI DON, ,GZHUNG GI DON, ,MJUG GI DON NO, ,DANG PO LA GSUM, ,SHIS PA BRJOD PA, ,PHYAG BYA BA, ,DNGOS PO NGES BSTAN NO, ,GNYIS PA GZHUNG GI DON LA GSUM, ,YI GE'I NGO BO, ,YI GE'I DBYE BA, ,YI GE KLOG TSUL LO, ,GSUM PA LA GSUM, ,SPYIR BSTAN PA, SO SOR BSHAD PA, ,DON BSDU BA'O, ,GNYIS PA LA GNYIS, ,DBYANGS KYI KLOG TSUL DANG, ,GSAL BYED KYI KLOG TSUL LO, ,GNYIS PA LA GNYIS, ,SPYI'I KLOG TSUL DANG, ,BYE BRAG GI KLOG TSUL LO, ,DANG PO LA GNYIS, ,SROG MED KYI KLOG TSUL DANG, ,SROG LDAN GYI KLOG TSUL LO, ,DANG PO LA GNYIS, ,SPYIR BSTAN PA DANG, ,SO SOR BSHAD PA'O, ,@004B GNYIS PA SROG LDAN GYI KLOG TSUL LA GNYIS, ,RE RE BA'I KLOG TSUL DANG, ,BRTZEGS PA'I KLOG TSUL LO, ,GNYIS PA LA GNYIS, ,BSDOMS NAS BRJOD RUNG GI KLOG TSUL DANG, ,BSDOMS NAS BRJOD MI RUNG GI KLOG TSUL LO, ,GNYIS PA BYE BRAG GI KLOG TSUL LA GSUM, ,RNAM BCAD KYI KLOG TSUL, ,LCE RTZA CAN DANG MTHU CAN GYI KLOG TSUL, RJES SU NGA RO'I KLOG TSUL LO, ,'DI DHARMMA BHA DRAS BRIS, ,SHU BHAm, ,SVA STI PRA DZ'A BHYA: SKYE RGU RNAMS LA BDE LEGS SHOG ,KE SHA CAN MGOR NYAL, ,PLU TA, ,MCHONGS, ,BI SARDZA, RNAM BCAD, ,AA NU SVA RA, RJES SU NGA RO, ,AE AEE AO AOO, ,AOm AA: ` PAR 'DI BZHAD LJONGS GRU 'DZIN CHOS GRVAR BZHUGS, ,
